HediffDef.label: Slave RFID tag
HediffDef.description: A slave identification RFID coil used by 3HST limited cooperation, pretty much useless here due to the lack of approperate infrastructure support. It's proximity to major arteries and trachea makes it risky to remove, a safety measure to prevent the tag from being uninstalled.

RecipeDef.label: install slave RFID tag
RecipeDef.description: Install a 3HST standard slave RFID tag. Useless on it's own, but slavers prefer tagged slaves and will pay better. However, removing the RFID coil is much more difficult and dangerous than installing it.

RecipeDef.label: remove slave RFID tag
RecipeDef.description: Removing the slave identification RFID chip installed in the neck. Due to it's proximity to major arteries and trachea, this operation can be risky.
